page.description: Returns an object with properties showing the number of records that have not yet been synchronized with the server.

argument.name: listId
argument.description: Identifies the list in the UX Component, in case you have more than one.

section.description: The object returned from the *[js:{dialog.object}.countRecordsToSynch]* method has these properties:

item.name: count
item.description: The count of all dirty records (edits, inserts and deletes.)

section.title: Example
